typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		InvoiceID as integer,
		VendorID as integer,
		InvoiceNumber as string,
		InvoiceDate as date,
		InvoiceTotal as float,
		PaymentTotal as float,
		CreditTotal as float,
		TermsID as string,
		InvoiceDueDate as date,
		PaymentDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ReadInvoicesTable
source(output(
		VendorID as integer,
		VendorName as string,
		VendorAddress1 as string,
		VendorAddress2 as string,
		VendorCity as string,
		VendorState as string,
		VendorZipCode as string,
		VendorPhone as string,
		VendorContactLName as string,
		VendorContactFName as string,
		DefaultTermsID as integer,
		DefaultAccountNo as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ReadVendorsTable
source(output(
		InvoiceID as integer,
		InvoiceSequence as integer,
		AccountNo as integer,
		InvoiceLineItemAmount as float,
		InvoiceLineItemDescription as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ReadInvoiceLineItemsTable
ReadInvoicesTable, ReadVendorsTable join(ReadInvoicesTable@VendorID == ReadVendorsTable@VendorID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinInvoicesVendors
JoinInvoicesVendors, ReadInvoiceLineItemsTable join(ReadInvoicesTable@InvoiceID == ReadInvoiceLineItemsTable@InvoiceID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinInvoiceLineItems
